privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.content:
At Team Unlocker GSM, we prioritize your privacy. We only collect minimal information necessary to process your service requests. 

1. Information Collection: We collect your device model, IMEI/Serial (for service processing), and your Telegram handle.
2. Data Usage: Your data is used exclusively for fulfilling the requested service. We do not sell or share your data with third parties.
3. Cookies: We do not use tracking cookies. Local storage is only used to remember your acknowledgment of our security warnings.
4. Security: We implement standard security measures to protect your information during transmission.

termsAndConditions.title: Terms and Conditions
termsAndConditions.content:
By using our services, you agree to the following terms:

1. Ownership: You must be the legal owner of the device being serviced. We do not support stolen or lost devices.
2. Service Risks: Software flashing and unlocking carry inherent risks. While we use verified methods, Team Unlocker GSM is not responsible for hardware failure or data loss during the process.
3. Illegal Activity: Any attempt to use our services for fraudulent or illegal purposes will result in an immediate permanent ban from our platforms.
4. Verification: We reserve the right to ask for proof of purchase for certain high-security services.

refundPolicy.title: Refund Policy
refundPolicy.content:
We strive for 100% success. If a service cannot be completed, the following apply:

1. Success Guarantee: If we are unable to fulfill your request due to a technical error on our side, a full refund will be issued.
2. Non-Refundable Scenarios: No refunds are provided if the device has hardware damage, if the user provides incorrect information (wrong model/IMEI), or if the user cancels the process after it has already started.
3. Processing Time: Approved refunds are processed within 24-48 hours via the original payment method used.
